author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest trailer for A Working Man, an upcoming action movie starring Jason Statham, Jason Flemyng, Merab Ninidze, Maximilian Osinski, Cokey Falkow with Michael Peña and David Harbour, Noemi Gonzalez, Arianna Rivas, Emmett J. Scanlan, and Eve Mauro.

Levon Cade (Statham) left his “profession” behind to live a simple life working construction and spending time with his daughter. But when his boss’s teenage daughter vanishes, he’s called upon to re-employ the skills that made him a legendary figure in the shadowy world of black ops. Levon’s hunt for the missing college student takes him to the heart of a sinister criminal conspiracy creating a chain reaction that will threaten his new way of life.

A Working Man, directed by David Ayer, opens in theaters on March 28, 2025.
title: A Working Man - Official Final Trailer (2025) Jason Statham, David Harbour

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Take-Two, the owners of the Grand Theft Auto franchise, have issued a take-down of another fan-made mod. YouTuber Dark Space has posted a video explaining what happened with his mod that put what he believed to be an accurate GTA 6 map into GTA 5. Dark Space argues that such moves hurt Take-Two's relationship with the community, the same community that makes its games popular in the first place. In other news, there's a not-zero percent chance that the popular online game Palworld makes its way to the Nintendo Switch 2, given the system is powerful enough to run it. That might be a little weird, considering developer Pocket Pair is involved in a lawsuit with Nintendo. And finally, MachineGames' Indiana Jones and the Great Circle finally has a PS5 release date.
title: GTA 6 Map Mod Takedown By Take-Two - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
The Doctor meets Belinda Chandra and begins an epic quest to get her back to Earth. But a mysterious force is stopping their return and the time-traveling TARDIS team must face great dangers, bigger enemies and wilder terrors than ever before. 

Meet the Doctor's new companion in this new Doctor Who trailer for Season 2 of the series starring Ncuti Gatwa as the Doctor, Varada Sethu as Belinda Chandra, and Millie Gibson as Ruby Sunday. Previously announced guest cast includes Rose Ayling-Ellis, Christopher Chung, Rylan Clark, Alan Cumming, Anita Dobson, Freddie Fox, Michelle Greenidge, Jonah Hauer-King, Ruth Madeley, Jemma Redgrave and Susan Twist.

Russell T Davies is showrunner, executive producer and writer. Additional executive producers are Joel Collins, Phil Collinson, Julie Gardner, and Jane Tranter. 

Season two of Doctor Who premieres Saturday, April 12 (12:00 a.m. PDT / 3:00 a.m. EDT) on Disney+, where available, and exclusively on the BBC and BBC iPlayer in the UK. New epis
title: Doctor Who: Season 2 - Official Trailer (2025) Ncuti Gatwa, Millie Gibson, Susan Twist

author: IGN
title: Liminal City is a new horror game that takes place in Backrooms Level 11! #gaming #backrooms #city

author: IGN
description:
The Summer Hikaru Died coming to Netflix in 2025.
Yoshiki and Hikaru live in a rural village and have been close friends since they were young. Six months earlier, Hikaru went missing in the mountains and returned unexpectedly a week later.
The new Hikaru looks and sounds just like the original, but something else is stirring within him. Yoshiki continues spending his days with the "something” imitating Hikaru, while pretending as if nothing has changed. Meanwhile, strange incidents begin to plague the village.
title: The Summer Hikaru Died - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Join members of the development team at Beenox Studios for a behind-the-scenes look at the Verdansk map coming to Call of Duty: Warzone. The team gives a deep dive into how they rebuilt the Verdansk map from the ground up with modern graphic fidelity, performance, and enhanced visuals as they used the new technology to upgrade the iconic map and discuss their goal to keep the nostalgic feeling in place. Verdansk returns to Call of Duty: Warzone on April 3, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
title: Call of Duty: Warzone - Official 'How We Rebuilt Verdansk' Intel Drop

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at action-packed gameplay from Metal Eden in this latest trailer for the FPS game from Reikon Games, the creators of Ruiner. Metal Eden will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on May 6, 2025. A demo for Metal Eden will be available starting April 8, 2025.

Metal Eden presents an adrenaline-fueled sci-fi FPS that explores a world where humanity's consciousness has transcended the flesh, now residing within robots.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Metal Eden - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Caught in the heat of a cosmic conflict between Earth and the Moon, Jack (Chiaki Kobayashi) enlists as a scout in the Earth army seeking vengeance against the Moon's rebel army but discovers an unexpected leader. Moonrise premieres April 10, exclusively on Netflix.
title: Moonrise - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Cyberpunk 2077: Turf Wars in this trailer for the arcade game from LAI Games created in partnership with CD PROJEKT RED. Cyberpunk 2077: Turf Wars features projection mapping technology integrated with vivid video visuals with physical targets, Blast Shooting Effect, and more. It also includes three game modes: Story Mode, Co-Op/Versus, and Sniper Mode. Cyberpunk 2077: Turf Wars is coming soon. @LAIGames  

#Cyberpunk2077 #Gaming #Games
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Turf Wars - Official Arcade Game Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for All Will Fall, a physics-based survival city-building game developed by All Parts Connected. Players will master the game's 3D construction system to create a vertical-based city filled with intricate structures to protect them from the harsh waters below. Search for resources, see what there is to see among the blue waters, and ensure the safety of the colony at all costs. All Will Fall is launching in 2025 for PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#AllWillFall #Gaming #IGN
title: All Will Fall - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Fortnite OG is crashing into Chapter 1, Season 3. Check out the latest Fortnite OG trailer before OG Season 3 launches on March 25, 2025. Go back to the moment that started it all and keep your eyes on the sky. The meteor is back, along with Lucky Landing, a loaded loot pool, and a new OG Pass.

#Fortnite #Gaming #Games
title: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 3 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to the rebellion. Check out the new Andor trailer for season 2 of the Star Wars series. Andor Season 2 stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. 

The final season will unfold over 12 episodes broken down into four chapters of three episodes each. The first chapter of season 2 will premiere April 22, with subsequent chapters debuting each week, exclusively on Disney+. 

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death St
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn, Stellan Skarsgård

author: IGN
description:
AEW Superstar Saraya sits down with IGN to chat about her upcoming book Hell In Boots. In it, the wrestler highlights past traumas, her wrestling journey, fighting for the women's revolution, her career ending twice, taking the pin for her peers, and more. 
Saraya has endless praise for fellow AEW wrestlers Harley Cameron, Toni Storm, Mercedes Mone, and Ruby Soho while also acknowledging her indie and WWE history and chatting about her fellow wrestling miracles Adam Copeland (Cope, FKA Edge) and Bryan Danielson (FKA Daniel Bryan). 
The Women's Revolution has been a major part of the wrestler's career and whether it was as WWE Diva's Champion or AEW Women's champion, that has always remained the same.

#AEWSuperstar #Saraya #IGN
title: AEW Superstar Saraya "Coming to the End" of Her Pro Wrestling Career | Hell In Boots

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Live Action PS5 Release Date Trailer for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, a first-person action-adventure game developed by MachineGames. Players will step into the shoes of Indiana Jones on a globe-trotting adventure in search of a secret to an ancient power connected to the Great Circle. Set between the events of Raiders of the Lost Ark and The Last Crusade, engage with two new whip abilities coming to all platforms to help fight back against sinister forces. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle launches on April 15 for early access and globally on April 17 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) with the game available now for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC.

#IndianaJonesAndTheGreatCircle #PS5 #Gaming
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Official Live Action PS5 Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join Arild Iversen (Audio Director of Funcom) and composer Knut Avenstroup Haugen for a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Dune: Awakening's soundtrack, and how Haugen brought the album to life with a live orchestra at the legendary AIR Lyndhurst studio in London. Dune: Awakening is a multiplayer survival game inspired by Frank Herbert’s legendary sci-fi novel and Legendary Entertainment’s award-winning films. Dune: Awakening will be available on PC on May 20, 2025. It is also coming to PS5 (PlayStation 5) and Xbox Series X/S at a later date.

#DuneAwakening #Gaming #IGN
title: Dune: Awakening - Official The Sound of Arrakis: Soundtrack Behind-The-Scenes Video

author: IGN
description:
Despite being squarely centered on martial arts mastery, Forestrike is a pixel-art 2D roguelike that has more in common with a chess match than an action game, as you repeat encounters until you’ve perfected them in one of the most satisfying, unique, and immediately compelling brawlers we’ve played in a very long time. Previewed by Travis Northup

#Forestrike #KungFu #Gaming
title: Forestrike Preview: Demanding Absolute Kung Fu Pixel-Art Perfection

author: IGN
description:
Liminal City offers an exploration-based psychological horror experience set in an infinite cityscape. Players must navigate through abandoned buildings, eerie empty streets, and unpredictable level shifts to find an escape.

Head over to Steam and add Liminal City to your wishlist now!

#LiminalCity #Gaming #IGN
title: Liminal City - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at gameplay from Town to City, the upcoming cozy city-builder set in an idyllic 19th-century Mediterranean town with a gorgeous (and delightfully soothing) voxel-powered art style, from the makers of last year's equally beautiful (and relaxing) Station to Station. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3115220/Town_to_City/

#TownToCity #Gameplay #IGN
title: Town to City: Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Quinn and her father have just moved to the quiet town of Kettle Springs hoping for a fresh start. Instead, she discovers a fractured community that has fallen on hard times after the treasured Baypen Corn Syrup Factory burned down. As the locals bicker amongst themselves and tensions boil over, a sinister, grinning figure emerges from the cornfields to cleanse the town of its burdens, one bloody victim at a time. Welcome to Kettle Springs. The real fun starts when Frendo the clown comes out to play.

#ClownInACornfield #Horror #IGN
title: Clown in a Cornfield - Official Trailer (2025) Katie Douglas, Aaron Abrams, Carson MacCormac

author: IGN
description:
In this Crimson Desert video showcasing Pearl Abyss' in-house BlackSpace Engine, which is the Engine used in the upcoming open-world action-adventure game, take a look at the Ray Tracing feature. The video shows a comparison highlighting the detailed differences between Ray Tracing off and Ray Tracing on in various in-game environments. At GDC 2025, developer Pearl Abyss showcased Crimson Desert's in-house BlackSpace Engine. Crimson Desert will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, and Mac in late 2025.

In Crimson Desert, explore a stunningly crafted open world teeming with life and intricate detail as you follow the journey of Kliff and the Greymanes across the vast continent of Pywel. Embark on the adventure of a lifetime as you traverse lush forests, medieval cities, quaint villages, frigid mountains, and scorching deserts. Along the way, encounter fascinating characters and be immersed in the rich and diverse cultures that make up the lands of Pywel.

#Cri
title: Crimson Desert - Official BlackSpace Engine: Ray Tracing Video

author: IGN
description:
At GDC 2025, developer Pearl Abyss showcased Crimson Desert's in-house BlackSpace Engine, which is the Engine used in the upcoming open-world action-adventure game. This video clip showcasing the BlackSpace Engine in action in Crimson Desert shows water movement as FFT Ocean Simulation and Shallow Water Simulation features dynamically illustrate waves and tides. Crimson Desert will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, and Mac in late 2025.

In Crimson Desert, explore a stunningly crafted open world teeming with life and intricate detail as you follow the journey of Kliff and the Greymanes across the vast continent of Pywel. author: IGN
description: Looking for a head start on how to play Anna Williams, the first character pack 2 DLC character in Tekken 8, before she releases on March 31? You're in the right place. Check out our starter guide covering Anna's best moves, punishes, and a few sample combos to get you started.
title: Tekken 8 - Anna Williams Starter Guide
